content: this sweet little hat is very easy to make and perfect for a newborn baby many hospitals and baby units require hats with no holes in the fabric - and this fits that requirement a lovely gender-neutral design worked in the round requires dk yarn 4mm crochet hook the pattern is written with uk terminology - and uses half treble_crochet stitch half_double_crochet in us terminology simple to make - and with a lovely modern look **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
